column2: This decision enters you into the English Route! \n§YThis decision is irreversible§!	 \n§RIF YOU DO NOT TAKE A PATH BY 1841 YOU WILL BE FORCED INTO THE DUAL PATH!§!
This decision enters you into the French Route! \n§YThis decision is irreversible§!	 \n§RIF YOU DO NOT TAKE A PATH BY 1841 YOU WILL BE FORCED INTO THE DUAL PATH!§!

This decision enters you into the Dual Route! 
The dual path gives you decisions to accept your cultures on a timer, You can choose to accept Irish, Provencal, French and English cultures seperately with each decision taking a different amount of time, you can do this one at a time. French and English take 14 Years," Provencal takes 12 years and Irish takes 9 years. It will take 49 total years to accept all cultures. I.E if you start in 1840 you will finish in 1889. 
§YThis decision is irreversible§!	 
§RIF YOU DO NOT TAKE A PATH BY 1841 YOU WILL BE FORCED INTO THE DUAL PATH!§!
We can begin integrating the English. \nThis will take 14 years. Afterwards you will receive English accepted culture and all English cores removed. (Just DM left)
We can begin integrating the French. \nThis will take 14 years. Afterwards you will receive French accepted culture and all French cores removed. (Just DM left)
We can begin integrating the Provencal. \nThis will take 12 years. Afterwards you will receive Provencal accepted culture and all Occitanian cores removed. (Just DM left)
We can begin integrating the Irish. \nThis will take 9 years. Afterwards you will receive Irish accepted culture and all Irish cores removed. (Just DM left)
We are currently integrating a minority into our realm. When this timer is up we may repeat the process!
